title: Month remaining for Employee Recognition Awards nominations (University of Windsor)
text: ( Source : University of Windsor ) Receiving an award for their service to the campus was an honour, says Shelly Scurr, one of the staff in the Faculty of Engineering 's Office of the Dean who received the 2014 team service excellence award at
